statements: SELECT * FROM beach_clean_up_sites;
SELECT site_name, location, date_cleaned FROM beach_clean_up_sites ORDER BY date_cleaned DESC;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location, plastic_weight_kg FROM beach_clean_up_sites WHERE location='Miami Beach';
SELECT * FROM beach_clean_up_sites WHERE plastic_weight_kg > 100;
SELECT site_name, date_cleaned, plastic_weight_kg FROM beach_clean_up_sites ORDER BY plastic_weight_kg ASC, date_cleaned DESC;
SELECT * FROM beach_clean_up_sites WHERE plastic_weight_kg > 100 ORDER BY date_cleaned DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT site_name, location FROM beach_clean_up_sites WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY site_name;
SELECT AVG(plastic_weight_kg) AS avg_plastic_weight FROM beach_clean_up_sites GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_plastic_weight DESC;
SELECT site_name, location, plastic_weight_kg FROM beach_clean_up_sites WHERE date_cleaned BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY plastic_weight_kg ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sites, SUM(plastic_weight_kg) AS total_plastic_weight FROM beach_clean_up_sites;
SELECT * FROM beach_clean_up_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM beach_clean_up_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM beach_clean_up_sites WHERE location = 'Miami';
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste ORDER BY collected_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, waste_type, weight FROM beach_clean_up_sites JOIN plastic_waste ON beach_clean_up_sites.site_id = plastic_waste.site_id;
SELECT * FROM beach_clean_up_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM beach_clean_up_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY collected_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, COUNT(waste_id) AS total_waste_count FROM beach_clean_up_sites JOIN plastic_waste ON beach_clean_up_sites.site_id = plastic_waste.site_id GROUP BY site_name;

SELECT site_name, SUM(weight) AS total_weight_collected FROM beach_clean_up_sites LEFT JOIN plastic_waste ON beach_clean_up_sites.site_id = plastic_waste.site_id GROUP BY site_name HAVING total_weight_collected > 500;
SELECT * FROM beach_clean_up_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM beach_clean_up_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM beach_clean_up_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM plastic_waste_data WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic Bottles' ORDER BY amount_collected DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM beach_clean_up_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM beach_clean_up_sites WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM beach_clean_up_sites ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.waste_type, p.amount_collected FROM users u JOIN plastic_waste_data p ON u.user_id = p.site_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';

SELECT site_name, SUM(amount_collected) AS total_collected FROM beach_clean_up_sites JOIN plastic_waste_data ON beach_clean_up_sites.site_id = plastic_waste_data.site_id GROUP BY site_name ORDER BY total_collected DESC;
SELECT * FROM BeachCleanupSites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM BeachCleanupSites WHERE plastic_waste_collected > 1000;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM PlasticItems WHERE item_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT report_date, total_waste_collected FROM CleanupReports WHERE site_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
SELECT * FROM BeachCleanupSites WHERE plastic_waste_collected > 1000 ORDER BY site_name DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT site_name, location, plastic_waste_collected FROM BeachCleanupSites JOIN CleanupReports ON BeachCleanupSites.site_id = CleanupReports.site_id WHERE CleanupReports.total_waste_collected >= 5000 GROUP BY site_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY plastic_waste_collected ASC

SELECT Volunteers.volunteer_name, COUNT(*) AS reports_submitted FROM Volunteers JOIN CleanupReports ON Volunteers.volunteer_id = CleanupReports.volunteer_id GROUP BY Volunteers.volunteer_name ORDER BY reports_submitted DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT site_name, SUM(item_quantity) AS total_items_collected FROM PlasticItems JOIN BeachCleanupSites ON PlasticItems.site_id = BeachCleanupSites.site_id GROUP BY site_name HAVING total_items_collected > 100 ORDER BY total_items_collected DESC

SELECT site_name, location, MAX(plastic_waste_collected) AS max_waste_collected FROM BeachCleanupSites WHERE site_name LIKE '%Beach%' GROUP BY site_name, location ORDER BY max_waste_collected DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM BeachCleanupSites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM BeachCleanupSites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CleanupVolunteers WHERE hours_spent > 5;
SELECT volunteer_name, hours_spent, site_name FROM CleanupVolunteers INNER JOIN BeachCleanupSites ON CleanupVolunteers.site_id = BeachCleanupSites.site_id;
SELECT equipment_name, description FROM CleanupEquipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM BeachCleanupSites ORDER BY site_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT site_name, location FROM BeachCleanupSites WHERE location = 'California' AND site_name LIKE 'Beach%' ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT site_name, plastic_type, weight_kg FROM BeachCleanupSites JOIN PlasticWasteData ON BeachCleanupSites.site_id = PlasticWasteData.site_id WHERE weight_kg > 100 ORDER BY weight_kg DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, hours_spent FROM CleanupVolunteers WHERE hours_spent < 10 ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CleanupEquipment WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY equipment_id ASC LIMIT 5;
